description: This file defines API endpoints for authentication, including user signup and login, using FastAPI. It handles user registration, credential verification, and token issuance, utilizing external modules for database interactions and token creation.

methods.name: TokenResponse signup(payload: SignupRequest)
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided details and returns a JWT access token.

methods.name: TokenResponse login( payload: LoginRequest | None = None, email: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Email for account login when using form-encoded payloads (alias of 'username').", ), password: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Password for account login when using form-encoded payloads.", ), username: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Alias used by OAuth2PasswordRequestForm; treated as the email.", ), )
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email/password or form data and returns a JWT access token.

ctags.name: login
ctags.signature: ( payload: LoginRequest | None = None, email: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Email for account login when using form-encoded payloads (alias of 'username').", ), password: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Password for account login when using form-encoded payloads.", ), username: str | None = Form( default=None, description="Alias used by OAuth2PasswordRequestForm; treated as the email.", ), )
